product_name: Moving Comfort Distance Run Dress - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Add a little pep to your running wardrobe with the stylish and comfortable Moving Comfort Distance Run dress. Polyester and spandex fabric offers quick-drying, moisture wicking performance. Internal mesh shelf bra offers light support. Mesh panels on front and back enhance ventilation. The Moving Comfort Distance Run Dress features a racerback and fitted styling. Closeout.
short_description: Add a little pep to your running wardrobe with the stylish and comfortable Moving Comfort Distance Run dress.
